title: A Knight With The Lost Boy
description: After the passing of his mother, Matthew Myrden sets off to find a new life for himself in the big city. What he doesn't anticipate is being robbed and losing everything he had left to his name. It could have been worse though, especially if someone had not intervened. With nothing left he has no choice but to attach himself to a handsome, yet terrifying stranger.Ace is just trying to keep his neighborhood safe. The Scabs have been encroaching onto his territory more and more lately, and he is determined to get to the bottom of it. When he sees what he thinks is a child getting attacked outside a diner he knows he has to step in. What he doesn't anticipate is not being able to get rid of him, even if he wanted to.A Knight With The Lost Boy is a full-length, stand-alone story with a guaranteed HEA
author: Chance Christopher
